review: Chromecast is a superb addition to entertainment systems. Initial setup is fairly quick, and streaming from a smartphone or laptop is very easy. Supported apps work very well, with great quality. As an additional option on some devices, you can also do a full screen cast, which can serve as a work around for unsupported apps. Overall, Chromecast is an excellent option for streaming music and video.The one issue I have found so far is that casting from a Chrome web browser tab from my laptop has been poor. However, I believe this is a router issue, and not a problem with Chromecast.
